creator: gyokzoli

title: LIMITE DE SESSAO PARA DOWNLOAD DE ARQUIVOS
content:
Srs, recentemente aumentei a minha velocidade de internet, para download de arquivos grandes durante o final de semana. Nos outros browsers consigo atingir a capacidade total de download ( 400MB no caso 40 mb/s ) de download.

No Firefox, limita cada sessão a um download de 100 Mb ( 10mb / s ) se eu baixar o mesmo arquivo 4 x terei cada sessão de 10 mb / s... se eu tentar baixar dois ao mesmo tempo só tenho 10mb / s por cada sessão,,

Infelizmente estou usando outros agora como Edge / Chome para essas ações. Todas as opções com sessões distintas do google drive ou o mesmo arquivo fazem a mesma coisa.

Alguém sabe se isso é uma limitação do Firefox e ou parametrização ? se for alguém pode me ajudar a ajustar isso??

Em anexo , teste com duas sessões simultâneas e 4 sessões simultâneas...
creator: ivanildont

title: The new version, 89.0.1, has removed the contrast and separation of the tabs, making it hard to read now.  Why?
content: I don't mean to be rude, but if you could get the decision-makers who authorize drastic changes to the appearance of the browser when a new release comes out to just stop "fixing" things that aren't broken, that would certainly satisfy me. I'm not picky about color schemes and "themes", but now the browser is difficult to read, and it wasn't before. I need to know how to restore the appearance of my browser to be the same as in the previous version, or I'll finally have to quit Firefox after all these years and switch to a different one. I don't want to have to do that, but I don't think I can manage to deal with this new hard-to-read low-contrast version. I'm sure someone thought this design looked "cool", and was therefore an improvement. I don't want to stifle anyone's creativity, but the browser I use has to be easier to read. Maybe the next release will offer a choice between the "look and feel" of the previous version versus this one. Thanks for considering my problem (and it is a problem for me), and I'll keep my fingers crossed.
creator: uhbc300
